favourite.article: Wow. This reminds me of my childhood in the church. I can't believe I found this song here. How wonderful!
Amen. Again just reminded that we need to set aside our own interest and take up God's interest. Awake Awake, Oh Generation. Yes Lord wake us up from this dark befuddled age.

I like this hymn because it causes me to encourage myself to be active in the church life mostly to preach the gospel and to care for the dormant saint and have a proper, real, enjoyable, and pursuable church living...
